post.description:
Request an email change; sends a token to the new address.

Requires authentication and validates uniqueness and difference from
the current email before sending a confirmation token.

Finalize email change using the email-bound token.

Applies the `pending_email` as the primary email, clears pending state,
and marks the new email as verified if the token is valid.
Send an email verification token to the user's email address.
Confirm email verification using the provided uid and token.
Initiate password reset flow; response is generic to prevent enumeration.
Validate password reset token and set a new password.

get.description:
Returns the current authenticated user's profile.

Auth: Requires JWT (Authorization: Bearer <token>) or session auth.

Response fields: id, username, email, first_name, last_name.

Errors: 401 if authentication credentials are missing or invalid.

post.description:
Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

Takes a set of user credentials and returns an access and refresh JSON web
token pair to prove the authentication of those credentials.
Class-based view wrapper for sign-out to align auth view styles.

Takes a token and indicates if it is valid.  This view provides no
information about a token's fitness for a particular use.

get.description:
Retrieve and update the authenticated user's profile.

parameters.description: Bearer <access_token>

patch.description: Update `email_opt_in`, `sms_opt_in`, and default addresses via `shipping_address`/`billing_address` (PKs). Ownership is validated.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer <access_token>

parameters.description: Shipping amount

parameters.description: Tax amount

post.description: Cancels the order unless it is paid. Idempotent when Idempotency-Key header is set.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Makes the request idempotent within scope+path+method

post.description: Marks the order as paid. Idempotent when Idempotency-Key header is set.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Makes the request idempotent within scope+path+method

patch.description: Update order email and/or shipping address while pending.

post.description:
Consumes a payment provider webhook and marks the order as paid.
Expects JSON with `order_id` and `event`='payment_succeeded'.
Idempotent when Idempotency-Key header is provided.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Makes the request idempotent within scope+path+method

get.description: Basic health endpoint for the payments app.

post.description: Creates or updates a PaymentIntent identified by `reference`. If `amount` is omitted, the total is computed from the order's items. Currency and provider are enumerated.

get.description: Fetch a PaymentIntent state by reference for the current user.

post.description: Initializes a Paystack transaction for an order. If `amount` is omitted, the total is computed from the order's items. Currency defaults to NGN and must be one of the supported `Currency` enum values.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Makes the initialize request idempotent for this user+path+method

post.description: Validates signature and processes charge.success events idempotently.

AddItem.description: Write serializer for adding an item to the cart.

AddItemGuest.description: Write serializer for adding an item to a guest cart.

Address.description:
Serialize postal addresses with a computed contact phone.

- `phone` is optional and validated as E.164 by the model.
- `effective_contact_phone` is read-only, using precedence:
  Address.phone  User.phone  None.

name.description: Optional recipient or label for the address

phone.description: Contact number for this specific address/recipient

Currency.description:
* `NGN` - Nigerian Naira
* `USD` - US Dollar
* `GHS` - Ghanaian Cedi
* `ZAR` - South African Rand
* `KES` - Kenyan Shilling
* `XOF` - West African CFA Franc

EmailOrPhoneTokenObtainPair.description:
Obtain JWTs by authenticating with either email or phone.

Accepts a single `identifier` field which may be an email address
(case-insensitive) or an E.164 phone number, and a `password`.
Returns `access` and `refresh` tokens on success.

Order.description:
API representation for an order.

Totals are computed on the fly for API responses to decouple from the
denormalized DB columns.

OrderItem.description: API representation of an order line item with computed line_total.

PatchedAddress.description:
Serialize postal addresses with a computed contact phone.

- `phone` is optional and validated as E.164 by the model.
- `effective_contact_phone` is read-only, using precedence:
  Address.phone  User.phone  None.

name.description: Optional recipient or label for the address

phone.description: Contact number for this specific address/recipient

PatchedProfile.description:
Serialize user profile preferences and defaults.

Provides a read-only `shipping_contact` that reflects the same precedence
for the default shipping address: Address.phone  User.phone  None.

PatchedUpdateItemQuantity.description: Write serializer for updating a cart item quantity.

PatchedUpdateItemQuantityGuest.description: Write serializer for updating a guest cart item quantity.

PaymentIntent.description: Read serializer exposing intent state and enums.

PaymentIntentUpsert.description: Create or update a PaymentIntent by reference with enums.

PaystackInitialize.description:
Validate input for initializing a Paystack transaction.

Fields:
- order_id: required order identifier owned by the current user
- amount: optional decimal; if omitted, computed from order items
- currency: optional; defaults to NGN, validated against supported choices
- reference: optional custom reference; sensible default applied in view

Profile.description:
Serialize user profile preferences and defaults.

Provides a read-only `shipping_contact` that reflects the same precedence
for the default shipping address: Address.phone  User.phone  None.

StockItem.description:
Read-only representation of stock for a variant.

Exposes computed ``available`` and the variant SKU for convenience.

UserMe.description: Serializer returning basic profile fields for the current user.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
